showScoreExcerpt: "There's the magic of it all, depicted in visual effects in which even the most jaded audience members, burned out from years of comic-book movies' eye-popping CGI, will almost certainly find wonder...Thankfully, 'Cursed Child' is a loving depiction of the rest of Potter's world, a greatest-hits tour of beloved characters, settings and wizarding wonders, largely told through the eyes of two new characters who more than deserve their place in the Rowling canon."

keyPhrases.quote: loving depiction of the rest of Potter's world
more than deserve their place in the Rowling canon

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Consistent praise for the visual effects, story, and characters with strong positive language like 'magic,' 'wonder,' and 'loving depiction' indicates clear recommendation despite being an excerpt. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses strong enthusiasm for the visual effects and overall depiction of the Harry Potter world, indicating a clear recommendation to see the show.
